## Data Plot

```{r}
#| label: lesions_plot
mlesion %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=les, y=animalID, color=tx)) +
    geom_point() + 
    labs(x="Lung Lesion Score", y="AnimalID", color="Treatment") + 
    scale_color_manual(values=c("black", "red")) +
    theme_bw()
```
